EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register: Pivotal's Next Generation Data Lake Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake> for our next webinar – Introduction to Pivotal's Next Generation Data Lake – on Thursday, March 27, 2014 at 9AM PDT/4PM GMT.
Apache Hadoop innovations continue to power and disrupt the data landscape, however, leveraging Hadoop for today's advanced analytics requires a steep learning curve and even more challenging mesh of additional technologies. Pivotal has been busy advancing and opening its unique enterprise Pivotal HD, HAWQ SQL query engine, and in-memory capabilities specifically to fit growing demands for advanced analytics and machine learning algorithms.
In this webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake> Pivotal will introduce its innovative Analytic Data Lake. We will cover recent enhancements providing more powerful and high performing analytics, leveraging in-memory technologies for real-time processing and analysis and unlocking Pivotal's capabilities for a wide variety of analytic languages, formats and interfaces. REGISTER <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake> to learn about unlocking Hadoop for next generation analytic intelligence. INTRODUCTION TO PIVOTAL'S DATA LAKE THURSDAY MARCH 27, 2014 9:00AM PDT 4:00PM GMT REGISTER <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake>
